1.title: Concept or Existing Mode
1.description: If you have an existing model or reference, we perform high-precision 3D scanning. If not, we begin with a design consultation to develop the concept together.

2.title: Prototype Creation
2.description: Based on the approved direction, we create a clay or 3D printing model. Adjustments are made until the design meets expectations.

3.title: 3D Digitalization
3.description: The approved physical prototype is scanned into a detailed 3D model and optimized for CNC carving.

4.title: CNC Carving
4.description: Advanced CNC machines carve the sculpture with precision, faithfully following the finalized 3D data.

5.title: Hand Detailing & Finishing
5.description: Skilled artisans refine every surface by hand to achieve depth, realism, and premium craftsmanship.

6.title: Delivery
6.description: The finished piece is carefully packaged and delivered to the customer's specified location.
